meeting_info.location: Canopy by Hilton Dallas Uptown, 2950 Cityplace W Blvd, Dallas, Matilda Room 8th Floor and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Discussion of Bylaws amendment
agenda_items.description: Discussion of Bylaws amendment of the City of Dallas Housing Finance Corporation (the “Corporation”)

agenda_items.title: Discussion of potential uses of funds
agenda_items.description: Discussion of the potential uses of the Corporation’s funds

agenda_items.title: Presentation on workforce housing study
agenda_items.description: Presentation and discussion of the October 2024 study conducted by The Concord Group on the costs and benefits of workforce housing in Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Discussion on targeted areas of development
agenda_items.description: Discussion on targeted areas of development to align goals with the City of Dallas Housing Policy (DHP33)

agenda_items.title: Discussion and approval of the Corporation’s 2025 Budget
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the Corporation’s 2025 Budget

agenda_items.title: Review of the Corporation’s 2025 calendar
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s 2025 calendar and planning session for conferences, board meetings and other calendar events
